```{r mutate_unit}
braking_data <- braking_data %>%
  mutate(speed_kmh = speed * 1.60934) %>%
  mutate(dist_m = dist * 0.3048)

head(braking_data)

```
```{r separate_data}
set.seed(1)
train_ind <- sample(1:50, size = 50 * 0.8)

```


```{r plot_data_point}

```
